title: im done
body:
ive officially had enough of this toxic community... GGWP i hope all the toxic players die in a hole somewhere....

4 team members gang up on 1 person in a game because they did poorly because of being camped for the first fucking 20 mins..... then they all say report the "insert whatever champ here" 

riot.... for the love of god and everyone who plays this fucking game.....


ill make this very clear to you guys how to approach toxicity in your game since you obviously cant fucking do it on your own....


******PERMA-BAN EVERY TOXIC INCIDENT******

0 TOLERANCE PERMA BAN UNREVOKABLE... 

THAT WILL FIX UR FUCKING TOXIC GAMING COMMUNITY HORSE SHIT







sincerely,

former league player

You just proved his point.

You were banned for being a jerk to other people, not because they decided to gang up on you, get over it: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/XnTlWEjR-banned-because-i-was-trolled-in-promotion-series

From [Riot Tantram](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/unobngtr-how-player-behavior-penalties-affect-hextech-crafting?show=rundown): 

>Actually, Erdrik is correct here.

>A report flags a game for review. They do not establish guilt. The game is then reviewed for harassment, feeding, etc. This is why 'troll reporting' or 'gang reporting' do not work. False or inaccurate reports are thrown out.

>You cannot ever be punished for saying nothing .. unless of course it's for something gameplay related like feeding, afking or cheating. But, you can never be punished for offensive language, hate speech or verbal abuse if you said nothing.
